channel.title: CVE Feed for Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon Auto, Snapdragon Compute, Snapdragon Connectivity, Snapdragon Mobile
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Qualcomm, Inc. -- Snapdragon Auto, Snapdragon Compute, Snapdragon Connectivity, Snapdragon Mobile

item.title: CVE-2020-11254|2024-08-04T11:28:13.799Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20auto%2C%20snapdragon%20compute%2C%20snapdragon%20connectivity%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile
item.description: Memory corruption during buffer allocation due to dereferencing session ctx pointer without checking if pointer is valid in Snapdragon Auto, Snapdragon Compute, Snapdragon Connectivity, Snapdragon Mobile

item.title: CVE-2020-11186|2024-08-04T11:28:13.380Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20auto%2C%20snapdragon%20compute%2C%20snapdragon%20connectivity%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile
item.description: Modem will enter into busy mode in an infinite loop while parsing histogram dimension due to improper validation of input received in Snapdragon Auto, Snapdragon Compute, Snapdragon Connectivity, Snapdragon Mobile

item.title: CVE-2020-11236|2024-08-04T11:28:13.764Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20auto%2C%20snapdragon%20compute%2C%20snapdragon%20connectivity%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile
item.description: Memory corruption due to invalid value of total dimension in the non-histogram type KPI could lead to a denial of service in Snapdragon Auto, Snapdragon Compute, Snapdragon Connectivity, Snapdragon Mobile

item.title: CVE-2020-11243|2024-08-04T11:28:13.794Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20auto%2C%20snapdragon%20compute%2C%20snapdragon%20connectivity%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile
item.description: RRC sends a connection establishment success to NAS even though connection setup validation returns failure and leads to denial of service in Snapdragon Auto, Snapdragon Compute, Snapdragon Connectivity, Snapdragon Mobile

item.title: CVE-2021-35102|2024-08-04T00:33:51.064Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20auto%2C%20snapdragon%20compute%2C%20snapdragon%20connectivity%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile
item.description: Possible buffer overflow due to lack of validation for the length of NAI string read from EFS in Snapdragon Auto, Snapdragon Compute, Snapdragon Connectivity, Snapdragon Mobile

item.title: CVE-2020-11237|2024-08-04T11:28:13.851Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20auto%2C%20snapdragon%20compute%2C%20snapdragon%20connectivity%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile
item.description: Memory crash when accessing histogram type KPI input received due to lack of check of histogram definition before accessing it in Snapdragon Auto, Snapdragon Compute, Snapdragon Connectivity, Snapdragon Mobile

item.title: CVE-2020-11273|2024-08-04T11:28:13.827Z -- qualcomm%2C%20inc. -- snapdragon%20auto%2C%20snapdragon%20compute%2C%20snapdragon%20connectivity%2C%20snapdragon%20mobile
item.description: Histogram type KPI was teardown with the assumption of the existence of histogram binning info and will lead to null pointer access when histogram binning info is missing due to lack of null check in Snapdragon Auto, Snapdragon Compute, Snapdragon Connectivity, Snapdragon Mobile
